description: This file defines a function initiatePayment that abstracts payment initiation logic in a provider-agnostic manner, with a mock implementation for testing or unspecified providers.

methods.name: initiatePayment({ amount, currency='INR', orderId })
methods.description: Asynchronously initiates a payment process, returning success status. Uses environment variables to determine payment provider and sandbox mode, with mock behavior as default.

ctags.name: initiatePayment
ctags.pattern: /^export async function initiatePayment({ amount, currency='INR', orderId }) {$/
